about.description: My name is Nikhil Pavan Sai and I'm a Full Stack Web Developer. I'm a Computer science graduate. I'm currently working as a Full Stack Web Developer at ZeMoSo Technologies PVT. Ltd. Developing cool stuff and playing around with new cutting edge technology is my hobby. I love experimenting.
about.hobbies: Well, apart from computers, I love outdoor sport. I play almost all outdoor games but much fond of Cricket.
about.getInTouch: Please feel free to write to me or shoot me an email!
